document_data.name: Maskado
document_data.mainbody: '''Maskado''' was a mysterious individual who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Maskado was a blue-skinned and tall [[humanoid]]. Because of his features, it was speculated that he maybe was a member of the [[Arcane (race)|Arcane]].
document_data.Activities: Maskado was the owner of [[Maskado's Maps & Legends]], a bookstore located in the [[City Core (Neverwinter)|City Core]] district. He usually dealt with [[adventurer]]s and bought from them information and maps, usually paying much less than the price he would later sell such things.
